name: email-testing-suite
description: Comprehensive email template testing and optimization suite

scripts.test:links: node -e "const Suite = require('./email-testing-suite.js'); const suite = new Suite(); suite.validateLinks().then(() => console.log('Links validated'));"
scripts.test:clients: node -e "const Suite = require('./email-testing-suite.js'); const suite = new Suite(); suite.testEmailClients().then(() => console.log('Client tests completed'));"
scripts.test:devices: node -e "const Suite = require('./email-testing-suite.js'); const suite = new Suite(); suite.testDeviceResponsiveness().then(() => console.log('Device tests completed'));"
scripts.test:html: node -e "const Suite = require('./email-testing-suite.js'); const suite = new Suite(); suite.validateHTML().then(() => console.log('HTML validated'));"
scripts.test:performance: node -e "const Suite = require('./email-testing-suite.js'); const suite = new Suite(); suite.analyzePerformance().then(() => console.log('Performance analyzed'));"
scripts.test:spam: node -e "const Suite = require('./email-testing-suite.js'); const suite = new Suite(); suite.analyzeSpamScore().then(() => console.log('Spam score analyzed'));"
scripts.generate:ab-tests: node -e "const Suite = require('./email-testing-suite.js'); const suite = new Suite(); suite.generateABTestVariations().then(() => console.log('A/B test variations generated'));"

author: RinaWarp Development Team
